sentences: While AT&T has focused on FirstNet and government contracts, Verizon's aggressive C-band deployment now covers 230 million people with mid-band 5G.
This milestone positions Verizon ahead in providing balanced speed and coverage that enterprise customers demand.
T-Mobile claimed early leadership in mid-band 5G through its Sprint merger, but Verizon has caught up remarkably quickly with 230 million people now covered.
Industry analysts note this demonstrates Verizon's execution capability despite entering the mid-band race later than rivals.
